GameConditionDef.label: blood moon
GameConditionDef.description: One of the moons has taken on a mysterious hue, and a newly crimson sky drowns out the soothing colors of livelier days.

GameConditionDef.label: mist from beyond
GameConditionDef.description: A mist has rolled in. Thick, steady, and sinister in its approach. Stepping foot within may dislodge lesser minds into spaces between spaces where basalt pillars rise.
